profile.rationale: The job ad describes a role that involves both developing and optimizing language models (1.B.1) and integrating these models into digital products and designing technical solutions (1.A.1). It also emphasizes building and optimizing data pipelines (1.A.2) and working with LLMs. While there's a strong emphasis on data engineering and software integration, the core task of developing and optimizing language models points towards a balanced role between software engineering and GenAI specialization. The explicit mention of 'Data Engineer LLM' and the tasks related to language models solidify this classification over a pure Data Engineer or AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the responsibilities, explicitly mentioning 'LLM' and tasks related to developing and optimizing language models, alongside data pipeline development and integration into digital products. The language used is direct and leaves little room for ambiguity regarding the core functions of the role.
